title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Sick Leave Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Sick Leave Act 2022 (Commencement)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Sick Leave Act 2022 (Commencement) 

Order 2022. 

In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Sick Leave Act 2022 (No. 24 of
text_norm: 1 order may cited sick leave act 2022 (commencement) order 2022 order act 2022 mean sick leave act 2022 (no 24

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Sick Leave Act
exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Sick Leave Act
heading: 3. The 29th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
3. The 29th day of November 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

sections 1 to 3; 

section 5(1), only insofar as that subsection relates to the 
definition of “statutory sick leave day”; 

section 6(1); 

section 7(1), only insofar as that subsection relates to the 
definition of “statutory sick leave payment”; 

(e) 

section 7(2).
text_norm: 3 29th day november 2022 appointed day following provision act 2022 shall come operation (a) (b) (c) (d) section 1 3 section 5(1) insofar subsection relates definition statutory sick leave day section 6(1) section 7(1) insofar subsection relates definition statutory sick leave payment (e) section 7(2)

title: exercise of the powers conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Sick Leave Act
heading: 4. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Act
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of January 2023 is appointed as the day on which the Act 

of 2022 (insofar as it is not already in operation) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 November, 2022. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd December, 2022.
